synopsis.text: Sukuna and Rika, two curses that shook the world of Jujutsu, found their hosts in Itadori Yuji and Okkotsu Yuta. But before their reign, the stage was set in spring 2006 with two unparalleled Jujutsu High sorcerers, Gojo Satoru and Geto Suguru. Assigned by the immortal Tengen, they embark on a mission to safeguard and erase the Star Plasma Vessel, Amanai Riko, the ideal candidate to unite with Tengen. However, the mission turns treacherous as a mysterious assassin, Fushiguro, seeks to eliminate Riko. The story unfolds, revealing the past of Gojo and Geto, who would later be known as the strongest sorcerer and the most wicked curse user. As they navigate through the mission, the bond between the two friends is put to the test, leading to consequences that will shape their destinies forever. Meanwhile, Utahime and Mei Mei investigate the peculiar disappearances of people in an abandoned house, adding another layer of mystery to this thrilling tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
